price: 51. Mais ceux qui se sont employés à mettre au défi Nos Signes, ceux-là seront voués à l’Enfer.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوۡاْ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna saʿaw fī āyātinā muʿājizīna ulāika aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
